Reference

All functions

Project-class

SyncroSim Project class

Scenario-class

SyncroSim Scenario class

Session-class

SyncroSim Session class

SsimLibrary-class

SyncroSim Library class

addBreakpoint()

Add a Scenario breakpoint.

addModule()

Add module

addPackage()

Adds a package to SyncroSim

addPackageFile()

Adds a package to SyncroSim

addRow()

Add row(s) to a dataframe.

addon()

addon(s) of a SsimLibrary or Session

`autogentags<-`()

Auto Generation Tags for a Scenario.

autogentags()

Auto Generation Tags for a Scenario.

backup()

Backup a SsimLibrary.

basePackage()

Installed base packages

breakpoint()

Lists the breakpoints for a Scenario.

command()

SyncroSim console command

datasheet()

Get a datasheet

datasheetRaster()

Get spatial inputs or outputs from a Scenario(s).

dateModified()

The last date a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario was modified.

delete()

Delete library, project, scenario, datasheet

deleteBreakpoint()

Delete a Scenario breakpoint.

deleteModule()

Delete module or modules

deletePackage()

Deletes a package

dependency()

Set or remove Scenario dependency(s), or get existing dependencies.

`description<-`()

Set the description of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

description()

Description of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

disableAddon()

Disable addon or addons.

enableAddon()

Enable addon or addons.

filepath()

The path to a SyncroSim object on disk

`ignoreDependencies<-`()

Ignore Dependencies Datafeeds for a Scenario.

ignoreDependencies()

Ignore Dependencies for a Scenario.

info()

Information about an library

`mergeDependencies<-`()

Merge Dependencies for a Scenario.

mergeDependencies()

Merge Dependencies for a Scenario.

model()

Installed models

module()

Installed modules

`name<-`()

Set ssimObject name.

name()

The name of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

`owner<-`()

Set the owner of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

owner()

The owner of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

package()

Installed or available packages

parentId()

The parent scenario id of a SyncroSim Scenario.

printCmd()

Get printCmd of a Session.

project()

Create or open a project or projects.

projectId()

The projectId of a SyncroSim Project or Scenario.

`readOnly<-`()

Set the read/write status of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

readOnly()

Read-only status of a SsimLibrary, Project or Scenario.

rsyncrosim

rsyncrosim: The R interface to SyncroSim: https://syncrosim.com/

run()

Run scenarios

runLog()

The run log of a result Scenario

saveDatasheet()

Save datasheet(s)

scenario()

Create or open one or more Scenarios.

scenarioId()

The scenarioId of a Scenario.

`session<-`()

Set a SyncroSim Session.

session()

Creates or returns a SyncroSim Session.

`silent<-`()

Set silent property of a Session

silent()

Check if a Session is silent

sqlStatement()

Construct an SQLite query

envInputFolder()

SyncroSim DataSheet Input Folder

envOutputFolder()
